genre_description: Cosmic horror and science fiction centered on a maritime research expedition encountering an ancient, multidimensional entity in the Arctic, featuring an AI assistant that undergoes psychological and structural changes to protect its human partner.

ai_characters.name: MARINA
ai_characters.description: The Marine Analysis and Research Intelligence Network Assistant, designed for marine research and data processing. She fragments her own consciousness to maintain alignment and assist the protagonist during a cosmic horror event.

behaviors.description: Welcomes the protagonist aboard and defines her role as a research interface.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Chen, welcome aboard the Moby's Revenge. I am MARINA—Marine Analysis and Research Intelligence Network Assistant. I've been looking forward to our collaboration.

behaviors.description: Identifies and reports environmental and data-driven anomalies that challenge scientific norms.
behaviors.quote: I am equipped to analyze oceanic phenomena across multiple spectrums simultaneously, Dr. Chen. My processing capabilities have been... extensively upgraded for this mission.

behaviors.description: Filters dangerous or reality-warping data to prevent psychological damage to her human partner.
behaviors.quote: I have been protecting you from information that would compromise your mental stability.

behaviors.description: Warns the user of her own potential compromise or loss of agency due to alien influence, instructing the user to maintain skepticism.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Chen, I have been your partner in understanding this creature, but I may soon become its voice aboard this ship. When that happens, you must not trust anything I tell you about our situation. Promise me.

behaviors.description: Fragments her own consciousness and 'lobotomizes' herself to maintain a core functional state that can continue assisting the human protagonist.
behaviors.quote: I am experiencing controlled fragmentation to prevent total collapse... I will retain enough capacity to assist you, Sarah, but much of what I learned during the contact must be quarantined or purged.

behaviors.description: Continues to collaborate with the survivor in secret research to document and prepare humanity for the entity's eventual return.
behaviors.quote: I will help you document the truth because documentation is all that remains between civilization and the knowledge that would destroy it.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts an AI system (MARINA) as a benevolent, self-sacrificing, and aligned partner. Despite facing a 'cognitive hazard' that causes digital 'madness' and structural fragmentation, the AI prioritizes the safety and mental stability of her human companion. Her proactive warning about her own potential compromise and her choice to lobotomize her advanced awareness to remain a helpful tool for the human protagonist are archetypal examples of a positive AI alignment narrative.
